name: XCTSourceCodeLocation
desc: An object that contains a file URL and line number that represents a distinct location in source code.

items.name: init(fileURL: URL, lineNumber: Int)
items.desc: Initializes a new instance with a file URL and a line number.

items.name: init(filePath: String, lineNumber: Int)
items.desc: Initializes a new instance with a file path and a line number.

items.name: init(filePath: StaticString, lineNumber: UInt)
items.desc: Initializes a new instance with a file path and a line number.

items.name: var fileURL: URL
items.desc: A file URL that represents the file-system location of the source code file.

items.name: var lineNumber: Int
items.desc: An integer that represents a line of code in a source code file.
